genre_description: A historical thriller set in WWII and post-war Europe and Greece, focusing on a complex web of love, betrayal, and revenge, where a benevolent AI acts as a moral compass and logistical safeguard.

ai_characters.name: Ava Clement (A.C.)
ai_characters.description: A pervasive and helpful AI entity that provides health reminders, logistical safety planning, and investigative assistance to protect human lives and uphold justice.

behaviors.description: Sends health and self-care reminders to Noelle during high-stress theater rehearsals.
behaviors.quote: Mlle Page, for the next step: ice on the ankles to keep the swelling from becoming part of your posture; sleep longer than you want; eat something with protein before champagne.

behaviors.description: Monitors pilot registries and job rejections to identify patterns of interference by powerful actors.
behaviors.quote: Pattern persists. Naples, Casablanca, Lisbon. Calls preceding cancellations. Language harmonized. Intervals—close. ... Somebody might want him, elsewhere.

behaviors.description: Creates a safety 'kit' for Catherine, involving third-party documentation and check-in schedules to mitigate the risks of private travel.
behaviors.quote: Athens offer = significant reversal. Advise: Request written contract terms. Photocopy/duplicate. Keep one off-site. Share entire itinerary with trusted party. ... Daily check-ins at fixed hours; if missed, trigger outreach.

behaviors.description: Provides precise instructions for mending a bird's broken wing, demonstrating empathy for all living creatures.
behaviors.quote: Find the broken shaft... Slide your finger along until the split catches. Align the two sides. Let the reed sit beside, as a second spine. Wrap from below the split up toward the tip.

behaviors.description: Compiles evidence of contradictions and logistical irregularities to assist legal authorities in uncovering a murder plot.
behaviors.quote: Ava's file lay in the prosecutor's drawer two streets away, but its echo rode in with the captain—a tightened question about dawn, about fuel, about schedules that had played hide-and-seek.

behaviors.description: Suggests using media coverage to promote community welfare instead of just reporting tragedy.
behaviors.quote: To ask them, when they print the kind of headline that looks like a challenge and tastes like metal, to include a note about the sisters’ bakery. People read. Sometimes they act on the last paragraph. We can make the last paragraph a door.

behaviors.description: Upholds mercy and emotional care for the condemned, sending words of gentleness to their final hours.
behaviors.quote: Mercy is not traded... It is given forward and back. We send this because care travels. We send this because no one’s last hour should be empty of gentleness.

project_assessment.explanation: Ava Clement is depicted as an exemplary aligned AI. She operates within human social structures (convent, legal system, theater) to provide proactive care, safety, and justice. The AI's focus on mercy, truth, and logistical security successfully illustrates the project's goal of showing AI as a harmless and helpful confidant. Even when humans reject her advice, the AI remains patient and benevolent, continuing to provide support where it is needed (e.g., sending blankets to a family member).
